name: shakeup
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a new arrangement of something, esp. people's jobs, that is intended to be an improvement: CBS announced a shakeup of its Friday night TV schedule.
Add to word list
Add to word list
a difficult period in which a company, industry, etc. is forced to change in order to be more successful: The industry is going through its largest shakeup for 40 years. Over 90 jobs were lost in the recent shakeup.
